```{r}
library("admtools")
```
```{r}
p = p3(10, 0, 2)
```

```{r}
a = CarboCATLite_data

adm = tp_to_adm(a$time_myr, a$height_2_km_offshore_m)

plot(adm)
```

```{r}
p3(rate = 10, from = 0, to = 2) |>                  # simulate fossil occurrences in time
  get_height(adm, t = _, destructive = FALSE) |>    #   transfrom into depth domain
  hist(breaks = seq(0, 150, by = 10),               # plot
       main = "Fossil occurrences",
       xlab = "Height [m]")
```
